titles.title: Relating to the privileges of the House.

action.text: Consideration initiated as a question of privilege.
Considered as a question of privilege.
The Chair recognized Members on the question of whether the resolution constituted a question of the privileges of the House.
The Chair ruled that the resolution did not constitute a question of the privileges of the House
Mr. Moran appealed the ruling of the chair. The question was then put on sustaining the ruling of the chair.
Mr. Armey moved to table the motion to appeal the ruling of the chair
On motion to table the motion to appeal the ruling of the chair Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 206 - 167, 1 Present (Roll No. 2).
Motion to appeal the ruling of the chair tabled.
Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/3/1996--Introduced. Provides that upon adoption of this resolution the House shall be considered to have taken from the Speaker's table H.R. 1643 (continuing appropriations) with the Senate amendment and to have concurred therein.
